actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management

official_title: To prohibit certain real property from being named after a sitting Member of Congress.
short_title: Prohibiting Taxpayer-Funded Monuments to Members of Congress Act

summary.text:
Prohibiting Taxpayer-Funded Monuments to Members of Congress Act

Prohibits any real property under the jurisdiction of the federal government or constructed using federal funds from being named after, or otherwise officially identified by the name of, any Member of Congress.

titles.title: Prohibiting Taxpayer-Funded Monuments to Members of Congress Act
To prohibit certain real property from being named after a sitting Member of Congress.
